primary.title: Delivery route planner for multiple routes & drivers
primary.description: Save hours each day with the Circuit delivery route planner. Make it easy to keep customers updated, and get proof of delivery. Ideal for delivery, small businesses, couriers who want to be faster.

image.alt: Map showing three different driver routes in Circuit for Teams

primary.title: 1000+ dispatchers use Circuit for Teams to manage their delivery operations and save time
primary.description: The fastest way to save yourself hours each day is with Circuit for Teams. That's why 1000+ businesses use Circuit.

items.Title: Spreadsheet import
items.description: Export a list of deliveries and import it into Circuit for Teams in 2 minutes or less. Got notes and other info you want drivers to see, that's not a problem either.

items.Title: Driver Tracking
items.description: Track the progress of your drivers in the field. See where they've been, where they are and where they're going in real time.

items.Title: Time windows / priorities
items.description: A customer paid for morning delivery, or a specific time slot? Include this in thespreadsheet or add manually and we'll ensure drivers arrive in time.

primary.title: Build routes in less than 5 minutes
primary.description: Got a list of stops and list of drivers? We'll handle the rest – no need to spend hours each morning manually figuring out the best way to allocate your stops between the drivers.

image.alt: Example showing "Import from spreadsheet" in Circuit for Teams

mobile.alt: Example showing "Import from spreadsheet" in Circuit for Teams

items.Title: Perfectly accurate ETAs
items.description: Need to know what time your driver will arrive at stop 5? Circuit for Teams's ETAs update automatically depending on whether the driver is behind on ahead of schedule.

items.Title: Proof of delivery
items.description: Need to know who signed for that package? Recipient names, signatures and photo proof are synced and saved for every stop.

items.Title: Customer Notifications
items.description: Give your customers peace of mind with upto date notifications available via email or SMS.

primary.title: Track and manage everything
primary.description: Driver tracking, proof of delivery, notifications, ETAs - Circuit provides everything you need to deliver successfully.

image.alt: Example showing proof of delivery (PoD) signature in Circuit for Teams

mobile.alt: Example showing proof of delivery (PoD) signature in Circuit for Teams

primary.title: How Burd Eggs Saved 30+ Hours a Week in Payroll
primary.description: When Zac started using Circuit, his direct-to-consumer delivery business became streamlined. Everything he needed for route optimization and tracking was available in the Circuit software.

image.alt: Zac with a lot of chickens and a chicken in his shoulder

primary.title: 1000+ businesses love Circuit for Teams
primary.description: “Circuit really saves us a lot of time, it saves us a lot of mental energy. So more than just those saved hours, I and my time are a lot less exhausted.” Zac Burd of Burd Eggs

items.title: Recipient
items.description: Ideal for retail and medium businesses

items.title: Enterprise
items.description: Ideal for dispatchers at high-delivery couriers

primary.title: Fair pricing that scales as you grow
primary.description: For 3% of what you pay your drivers, you could have them deliver 20% more packages

primary.title: Everything you need for your delivery operation. All in one place
primary.description: Optimize, track, and manage your  delivery operation, with no map books, no local area knowledge, and no learning curve; just multiple optimized routes, driver tracking, and customer notifications, in just a few clicks.

meta_title: Circuit for Teams: Route Planning Made Easy
meta_description: Try Circuit free for 14 days to optimize, manage, and measure your courier teams. Circuit for Teams makes it easy to plan multiple driver routes

social_cards.social_card_title: Route Planning for Multiple Drivers Made Easy
social_cards.social_card_description: Planning delivery routes for multiple couriers isn't easy. Try Circuit free for 14 days, and save hours.
